verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a voice in the silence,
Piercing the darkness of my own selfish soul
There's a cry deep within me, a yearning to feel you
I look to you, Lord

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
I can pretend I don't run from the feelings
I'm trying to hide
Must get the focus of me and my problems
I look to the cross

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my Rock jn You I stand
Safe from the storms that surround me
You're my only Rock, In you I can
Don't have to rely on my own strength.
